diagrams.description: A flowchart showing the fundamental concepts and structure of Philosophy of History.
diagrams.mermaid_code:
flowchart TD
    PhilosophyofHistory[Philosophy of History] --> Field1[Philosophy]
    PhilosophyofHistory --> Field2[History]
    PhilosophyofHistory --> Integration[Integration Areas]
    philosophy --> philosophySub1[Theory]
    philosophy --> philosophySub2[Practice]
    history --> historySub1[Theory]
    history --> historySub2[Practice]
    Integration --> Methods[Research Methods]
    Integration --> Applications[Applications]
